abstract: Peter Brant says he is selling Art in America magazine to ARTnews.
lead_paragraph: The merged publications will have a bundled print subscription under the Art in America brand, with ARTnews focusing on special themed editions.

headline.main: Art in America Sold to ARTnews Owner
headline.print_headline: Art in America Sold to ARTnews Owner

snippet: The merged publications will have a bundled print subscription under the Art in America brand, with ARTnews focusing on special themed editions.
